features: Repair, Rejuvenate, and Radiate: The Air Repair Skincare dehydrated skin moisturizer for women and men is designed to nourish and hydrate dull, dry skin. We made this moisturizing face cream paraben free, so you can glow more beautifully over time.

Create an Easy Skincare Routine for Yourself: Perfect as a skin repair moisturizer for aging skin, our cruelty free moisturizer for women and men is effortless and quick-absorbing. Massage our vegan face cream into your face and neck for instant rehydration.

Soothe Sensitive Skin: This regenerating moisture repair cream works for all skin types and climates. Fight inflam-aging and minimize the effects of extreme temperatures with our vegan moisturizer for face.

Use as Often as You Want: You’ll never have too much of our skincare repair face hydrating moisturizer cream thanks to its gentle and high-quality ingredients like hyaluronic acid, green tea, rose hip, and aloe vera. Hydrate as often as needed with our travel size face moisturizer.

Be a Discerning Beauty Enthusiast: Air Repair Skincare Products are free from parabens, petroleum, and mineral oils. We use naturally derived ingredients and clean chemistry to effectively combat inflam-aging and supercharge your complexion.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: REPAIR, REJUVENATE, & RADIATE The Air Repair Skincare dehydrated skin moisturizer for women & men is designed to nourish & hydrate dull, dry skin. We made this moisturizing face cream paraben free, so you can glow more beautifully over time. CREATE AN EASY SKINCARE ROUTINE FOR YOURSELF Perfect as a skin repair moisturizer for aging skin, our cruelty free moisturizer for women & men is effortless & quick-absorbing. Massage our vegan face cream into your face & neck for instant rehydration. SOOTHE SENSITIVE SKIN This regenerating moisture repair cream works for all skin types & climates. Fight inflam-aging & minimize the effects of extreme temperatures with our vegan moisturizer for face. USE AS OFTEN AS YOU WANT Use as Often as You Want: You’ll never have too much of our skincare repair face hydrating moisturizer cream thanks to its gentle & high-quality ingredients like hyaluronic acid, green tea, rose hip, & aloe vera. Hydrate as often as needed with our travel size face moisturizer.

CLEAN CHEMISTRY & HEALING BOTANICALS Our products are naturally derived, vegan, & cruelty-free. All our self-care items are created without using petroleum, mineral oils, & parabens. We make use of ingredients that will keep you glowing over time. EFFORTLESS SKINCARE Air Repair is a simplified skincare regimen you can use daily. Lightweight & easy to apply, our products leave your skin instantly refreshed & ready. We make self-care quick & convenient for you. FOR ALL CLIMATES & SKIN TYPES Our products are formulated to help your skin recover from too much sun, harsh winds, & extreme weather conditions. Carefully made, each self-care item is designed to gently nourish & improve even the most sensitive skin. IN HONOR OF DENISE SPANEK Denise developed Air Repair Skincare to make it easier for anyone to achieve youthful, glowing skin at any age. We honor her spirit by realizing her dream of providing the highest quality products without breaking the bank.
Created with Clean Chemistry, Healing Botanicals, & Natural Extracts

Complexion-Boosting Moisturizer Super Hydrating Eye Cream Description A moisture-retaining formula for rejuvenating dull, tired, & dehydrated skin A nourishing cream that instantly improves & protects the skin around your eyes Free from Parabens, Petroleum & Mineral Oils ✓ ✓ Key Ingredients Cloudberry Seed Green Tea Hyaluronic Acid Vitamin B Rose Hip & Borage Aloe Vera Green Tea Cloudberry Seed Vitamin C Allantoin Tocopherol Eyeliss Haloxyl Vegan & Cruelty-Free ✓ ✓ Applicable Area Face & Neck Around the Eyes Size 59ml/2 fl oz 15 ml/0.5 fl oz

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Highly Underrated Daily Moisturizer!
reviews.reviewText: I’m honestly not sure how this product is not more popular. I’ve been using it for a few of years now, and I can tell a difference in my skin even overnight after one use.I have VERY sensitive and angry skin (my skin is considered “combination”, as well as veryyy acne-prone. I also have a skin condition called dermotographia)This product goes a long way; you only have to use a small amount to cover your face/neck areas. The lotion absorbs completely very quickly, and has an extremely light and pleasant scent.The only caveat is that there’s not UV protection. It would be a wonderful addition to include a version with SPF. Other than that, it’s a perfect product, in my opinion. I hope it works as well for you as it has for me.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 19, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This is the only moisturizer I will use. I’m 64 with dry and oily skin. I have a few wrinkles and trying to prevent more. I use it every day and it is so smooth, but not greasy. Very good moisturizer. I recommend it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 28, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best Moisturizer- Sincerely, a customer for a year
reviews.reviewText: This moisturizer is the best I have ever tried before, and I’ve been using it for at least a year now. It instantly absorbs into the skin and leaves you feeling stick-free and hydrated. The scent is a neutral one— all great and non-irritating skincare products are non-scented, which is why you know this one is the best thing for your skin. I recently ordered another bottle, and I got a free lip gloss and serum with a hand written note, thanking me for my loyalty to their product. The Air Repair team values you as a customer and seem to truly care about you and the wellbeing of your skin. I’d definitely recommend this product to anyone looking for amazing skin while using a responsibly made product.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 24, 2019
reviews.reviewText: This is a really nice moisturizer. I experience long lasting moisturized skin when using this. I've even noticed that my frown lines are going away. The scent is light and fresh, and you don't feel like an oil spill when using it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 28, 2016
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars 10/10 would recommend! TRY IT!
reviews.reviewText: I received a sample of this through a beauty subscription & fell in love with it! So I ordered a bottle! it's a great, non greasy lightweight moisturizer, exactly the same as the sample I received through my subscription as far as I can tell. I have oily, sensitive, acne-prone skin. This moisturizer doesn't make me any more or less oily, nor does it irritate my skin, it rather soothes skin from the chemicals in my RX acne creams & from sun/wind burn. It also doesn't clog pores or cause any breakouts, which is rare for me! I use it every night following my acne cream, been using for about four months now with no issues. It goes a long way as well, so the small bottle can last me three months easily. A small pea sized amount covers my entire face and neck!Having hyaluronic acid in it is just a plus. If you don't know the benefits of hyaluronic acid, Google it & be amazed! it's a wonderful addition & great for your skin.10/10 would recommend! The formulation is perfect for me & the added benefits of hyaluronic acid make it an incredible product that I plan on using until I die or it's discontinued, which will force me to stock up on it before it's gone!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 25, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great daily face cream
reviews.reviewText: I have been using this cream on my face for years and I love it. Very lightweight yet fully moisturizing. It fully absorbs into skin and doesn't leave skin with a dew or grease feeling like many other face creams. I wish it had retinol in it, as some people say retinol is good for fine lines/wrinkles, but it has many natural ingredients that combat fine lines.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 21, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars My Favorite Moisturizer
reviews.reviewText: This is the perfect moisturizer; I have used many different kinds and this one tops them all.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 17, 2021
reviews.reviewText: I ordered previously and found the moisturizer wasnt as good as the first one I experienced. The seller done an excellent job at making it right and I have to say it was wonderful. I love the silky feeling and how hydrating it is with no heavy waxy feel its light and I use it on my neck also. I have rosacea and I cant use certain creams and this is wonderful and does not break me out. I would recommend and if you have skin issues I feel this would be great for all types and to me it smells like a vitamin c cream it's not strong at all!! I use expensive creams for my whole face neck and eyes and I really love this product and cant wait to post future progress. To be continued.
